data: It can hardly be wondered at that these suddenly presented ambitious projects—this call to be up and doing, and getting forward in the general race of the world—should add a new interest and fascination, in his eyes, to the society of the American father and daughter who had wandered into these distant wilds.
browsing: culture/civilization/society|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: romance|category: novels|category: british literature
